name: Legion of Super Heroes: Princess Projectra Quiz | Entertainment | 10 Questions

questions.text: What is Princess Projectra's real name?
questions.explanation:
Projectra.

	Projectra is one of a handful of Legion members who use their real name as their code name.

questions.text: What is Princess Projectra's home planet?
questions.explanation:
Orando.

	Orando is reminiscent of Earth's medieval Europe.  The citizens of the planet want nothing to do with technology or citizens from other planets.

questions.text: Princess Projectra has the ability to create realistic illusions.  In original Legion continuity, how did she gain this power?
questions.correct: It was the result of a witch's spell
options: From an accidental exposure to the Phantom Zone
All citizens of her home planet have this ability
questions.explanation:
It was the result of a witch's spell.

	This ability was given to her during her birth ceremony.  Her royal lineage is mystic based and she is classified as homo-magi, making her more connected to magic and the supernatural.

questions.text: Princess Projectra once contracted the "Pain Plague".  The only way to save her is for four fellow Legionnaires to siphon off one hour intervals of her pain into themselves.  Which four Legionnaires accomplished this?
questions.correct: Timber Wolf, Saturn Girl, Karate Kid and Duo Damsel
options: Ferro Lad, Chemical King, Invisible Kid and Superboy
Light Lass, Saturn Girl, Shrinking Violet and Phantom Girl
Ultra Boy, Supergirl, Mon-El and Superboy
questions.explanation:
Timber Wolf, Saturn Girl, Karate Kid and Duo Damsel.

	"Who can save the Princess" from 'Superboy' #209 (1975).  Superboy rushed to Legion HQ to take the final hour's pain.  Upon arrival he discovers his invulnerability prevents the process from working.  Retired Legionnaire Duo Damsel saves the Princess by taking on the final hour of severest pain and splitting herself into two, diving the pain between her two selves.

questions.text: Princess Projectra eventually marries which fellow Legionnaire?
questions.explanation:
Karate Kid.

	After the passing of her father, the King, Projectra ascends to the throne and becomes Queen Projectra.  She and Karate Kid marry and resign from active Legion membership.

questions.text: How does Queen Projectra deal with Nemesis Kid, after he causes the death of her husband?
options: She has him sentenced to Talkron Galtos, the prison planet.
She banishes him to the royal dungeon
She causes him to see a permanent illusion of his worst fears
questions.explanation:
She snaps his neck.

	When questioned by other Legionnaires, she states, "I executed a condemned man as is my royal privilege.  Do any of you dare call me wrong?"

questions.text: Years after the death of her husband, Queen Projectra returns to the Legion.  However, she returns using a disguise and new code name, her true identity known only to Saturn Girl.  What is her new identity?
questions.explanation:
Sensor Girl.

	Sporting a full facial mask and a different hair color, Sensor Girl's identity was held secret so that Legion enemies would not know that Projectra's newly enhanced abilities were still ultimately based in illusion.

questions.text: Which long time Legion villain does Projectra inadvertently kill by honoring the villain's request for assistance?
questions.explanation:
Emerald Empress.

	The Empress begs Sensor Girl to separate her from the evil influence of the Emerald Eye of Ekron.  When Sensor Girl (Projectra) honors this request, the immortality that the Eye had been giving the Empress was gone... and her body dissolves to dust.

questions.text: In the Legion's Post Zero Hour/Reboot continuity, an illusion casting member (similar to the previous continuity's Princess Projectra) joins the team. It is soon revealed that her humanoid appearance is also an illusion.  What is her true form?
questions.explanation:
Snake-like.

	In this continuity, Jeka Wynzorr of Orando joins the Legion using the code name Sensor.  Her planet Orando has a ruling class that are all (human-size) sentient snake like beings, and the underclass are sentient raccoon like beings.

questions.text: In the "Threeboot" Legion continuity, Projectra is again admitted to the Legion of Super Heroes.  Originally she has no powers.  For what reason was she extended membership in the group?
questions.explanation:
Her money.

	This continuity had no R.J. Brande as a financial benefactor.  Joining as Projectra (real name Wilimena Morgana Daergina Annaxandra Projectra Velorya Vauxhall), the princess of Orando served as a way for the newly formed Legion to keep money coming in.  Later, she eventually gains illusion casting powers in this continuity.
